nodes.excerpt: Brew is the fastest way to invest your money in DeFi. Link your bank account and transfer funds in a matter of clicks. Brew converts your deposit to stablecoin (USDC) and deploys it on proven DeFi Protocols helping you earn up to 10% yield.
nodes.title: Brew - Simplest way to earn inflation-beating yield on DeFi

nodes.excerpt: What do you do with extra coupons that you would not need? What if you could swap them with something that you would use? Sounds cool? That's CouponHub for you.
nodes.title: CouponHub - The peer-to-peer coupon exchange platform
nodes.author: Shuvam Manna

nodes.excerpt: Do you often forget if you've done something important? I keep coming back to check if I've locked the doors. You can check the toggle when you close the door or something. The app also reminds you when you go out using the geolocation (isn't shared anywhere)
nodes.title: Locked.app - Press a toggle to quickly remember important things
nodes.author: alexandroff.

nodes.excerpt: News Line is revolutionising the way news is consumed in India. It is India's first short-video journalism platform. Its key features are ads-free flashcards (news in 60 words) and short video bites (news in 30 seconds).
nodes.title: News Line - India's most consumable form of news
nodes.author: pushpal maheshwari
